info.name: SinLlama API
info.description:
Sinhala LLM inference API powered by Meta-Llama-3-8B with SinLlama LoRA adapter.

**Endpoints:**
- `GET /health` — Health check (no auth)
- `POST /generate` — Raw text generation
- `POST /ask` — General-purpose LLM chat
- `POST /chat` — Child conversation for IoT toy

**Authentication:** All endpoints except `/health` require the `X-API-Key` header.

request.description:
Health check endpoint. Returns server status, model loading state, and GPU VRAM usage.

**No authentication required.**

Raw text generation endpoint. Sends a prompt and returns the model's continuation.

**Request Body:**
| Field | Type | Required | Default | Range |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| `prompt` | string | Yes | — | — |
| `max_new_tokens` | int | No | 256 | 1–1024 |
| `temperature` | float | No | 0.7 | 0.1–2.0 |
| `top_p` | float | No | 0.9 | 0.0–1.0 |
| `top_k` | int | No | 50 | 0–200 |
| `repetition_penalty` | float | No | 1.1 | 1.0–2.0 |

General-purpose LLM chat endpoint — minimal request with just a message. Uses the default Sinhala system prompt.

**Required:** `message` (string)

response.name: Success

item.name: Ask — With History & Custom System Prompt

request.description:
General-purpose LLM chat endpoint with full options — custom system prompt, conversation history, and generation parameters.

**Request Body:**
| Field | Type | Required | Default | Range |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| `message` | string | Yes | — | — |
| `system_prompt` | string | No | Sinhala default | — |
| `conversation_history` | list[{role,content}] | No | [] | last 10 |
| `max_new_tokens` | int | No | 512 | 1–1024 |
| `temperature` | float | No | 0.7 | 0.1–2.0 |
| `top_p` | float | No | 0.9 | 0.0–1.0 |
| `top_k` | int | No | 50 | 0–200 |
| `repetition_penalty` | float | No | 1.1 | 1.0–2.0 |

response.name: Success

request.description:
Child conversation endpoint for the IoT toy. Generates child-friendly Sinhala responses with optional phoneme targeting for speech therapy.

**Request Body:**
| Field | Type | Required | Default |
|---|---|---|---|
| `child_utterance` | string | Yes | — |
| `child_name` | string | No | "ළමයා" |
| `target_phoneme` | string | No | "" |
| `conversation_history` | list[str] | No | [] (last 6 kept) |
Child conversation with conversation history. History entries are plain strings in the format `"දරුවා: ..."` or `"සහකාරයා: ..."`. Last 6 turns are kept.

response.name: Success
